mapper.select: select t1.wen_pass_num as level, t2.avatar_url as avatarUrl, t2.nickName, t2.wx_openid as openId from tb_score_today t1 left join tb_player_wx_info t2 on t1.player_id = t2.player_id where t1.wen_pass_num is not null and and t1.wen_pass_num <> 0 and t1.CREATED_TIME = #{date} order by t1.wen_pass_num desc

select t1.wu_pass_num as level, t2.avatar_url as avatarUrl, t2.nickName, t2.wx_openid as openId from tb_score_today t1 left join tb_player_wx_info t2 on t1.player_id = t2.player_id where t1.wu_pass_num is not null and t1.wu_pass_num <> 0 and t1.CREATED_TIME = #{date} order by t1.wu_pass_num desc
